src:
BHIC委任Mohd Fakhrul为财务总监
04 Nov 2019, 06:58 by Justin Lim
（吉隆坡4日讯）Boustead Heavy Industries Corp Bhd（BHIC）宣布，委任Mohd Fakhrul Arifin Adinan为财务总监。
该集团今日向大马交易所报备，这项任命于11月1日生效。
现年35岁的Mohd Fakhrul自2014年4月加入该集团。此前，他于2005年在安永会计事务所展开他的职业生涯。
截至2时40分，BHIC起4仙或3.17%，挂1.30令吉，市值为3亿2300万令吉。
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
Boustead Heavy Industries names Mohd Fakhrul Arifin as new CFO

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
BHIC appoints Mohd Fakhrul as Chief Financial Officer
04 Nov 2019, 06:58 by Justin Lim
KUALA LUMPUR (Aug 4): Boustead Heavy Industries Corp Bhd (BHIC) announced the appointment of Mohd Fakhrul Arifin Adinan as Chief Financial Officer.
The group reported to the Bursa Malaysia today that the appointment took effect on November 1.
Mohd Fakhrul, 35, joined the group in April 2014. Previously, he started his career at Ernst & Young in 2005.
As of 2:40, BHIC rose 4 sen or 3.17%, hanged 1.30 ringgit, and the market value was RM323 million.
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
Boustead Heavy Industries names Mohd Fakhrul Arifin as new CFO

Via theedgemarkets.com
